Class BoardPict

java.lang.Object
  BoardPict

public class BoardPict
extends Object

The playing board has 4 quadrants (upper/lower, left/right) with the bar standing vertically between them. Colors are defined here, so they can be tweaked.

Version:
2012 Jan 30
Author:
Mike Roam

Constructor Detail

BoardPict

public BoardPict()
Constructor for objects of class BoardPict. Hmmm, could use static initializers like barRect above. If board gets resizeable many of the things above would need to merely lose the "final". Beware of changing board size while a move or click is going on?
